lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton isn’t the only one nostalgic for an old staple of the American road: Meet the Vandoleros, a Los Angeles brotherhood of heavy rollers.

headline.main: Riding a Van Back to the ’70s

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton isn’t the only one nostalgic for an old staple of the American road: Meet the Vandoleros, a Los Angeles brotherhood of heavy rollers.
abstract: Growing number of custom-van enthusiasts in Los Angeles are seeking to bring back 1970s van culture, when vans were painted with murals and modified like hot-rods; van club Vandoleros and magazine Rolling Heavy, both started by revivalists, are dedicated to trend.
